NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WPF.​Controls.​BaseWindow
Window
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WPF.​Controls.​BaseWindow
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WPF.​DownloadProgressWindow
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WPF.​UpdateAvailableWindow

Base Window class for most WPF update windows.  Provides utilities and common code for windows that are shown.

Variables
_isOnMainThread
protected bool _isOnMainThread

Whether or not this Window is on the main thread or not

_hasInitiatedShutdown
protected bool _hasInitiatedShutdown

Whether or not the close window code has been called yet (so that it is not called more than one time).

Functions

public BaseWindow()

Public, default construtor for BaseWindow objects

public BaseWindow(
bool useClosingEvent
)

Create a BaseWindow and set up the closing event handler if requested

Parameter
useClosingEvent
bool

true to use the Window.Closing event handler; false otherwise

object sender,

)
ShowWindow
protected void ShowWindow(
bool isOnMainThread
)

Show this window to the user.

Parameter
isOnMainThread
bool

true if the window is being shown while on the main thread; false otherwise

CloseWindow
protected void CloseWindow()

Close the window and shut down the UI dispatcher if necessary

BringToFront
protected void BringToFront()

Bring this window to the front of all other windows by temporarily setting Topmost to true.
